entities.name: sion jinx
entities.description: Sion Jinx is mentioned as a character who was taken inside the Fidelius Charm's protection.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore died and Harry and Hermione are now Secret-Keepers.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a Death Eater who can get inside the house through Apparition.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who has become happier and friendlier.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye's eye was drawn out by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character who is now a Secret-Keeper.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who will not eat the steak-and-kidney pie.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character who recoiled at Mad-Eye's eye.

relationships.description: Harry protected Sion Jinx inside the Fidelius Charm's protection.
Dumbledore died and Harry became a Secret-Keeper.
Yaxley can get inside the house through Apparition.
Kreacher belongs to Harry and is a part of his household.
Hermione reacted with horror at Mad-Eye's eye.
Ron will not eat the steak-and-kidney pie.
Harry will not eat the steak-and-kidney pie.
